name: QR Code Generator
description: In this project I created a QR code generator service. Users can type an arbitrary text or url into an input box hit a button and this tiny app generates a printable QR code encoding the input.
long: This could be useful in a party sharing the WiFi password with others. I learned some basic node.js and serving some page with a server using the pug view engine.

name: Strong Password Generator
description: This program help to generate random strong passwords for the everydays. There are some options to decide what our passwords should look like
long: I used a randomize package to manage the characters' diversity. We can use uppercase and lowercase characters numbers and symbols too.

name: Adventure Game
description: It's a fantasy adventure story in terminal.
long: We got some questions and we need to choose the answers to decide what character will we play and what kind of skills we have during this adventure.
